title: Charging time of pixel 3axl
content: How much time pixel 3axl take to charge from o to 100%? Mine is taking 1hr 45 minutes approximately. And when it start getting close to 100% it charge slowly like from 90% to 100% it takes 10 minutes. This all happening after upgrading to android 11. Is this a Problem or its normal after upgradation. I let it Fully discharge and then charged it I don't have any battery draining issue it is working fine.
